page.title: 01 UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: Unemployment in this area is extremely high.Our area is situated in a region which has among the highest unemployment figures in Britain.Because companies prefer to be closer to the big cities,where they can get trade more easily,they situate themselves nearer to Glasgow.The opening of Prestwick Circuits factory and the SCI computer factory in neighbouring Irvine has helped to reduce the figures slightly. Springside is an old mining village and when the mines closed,most of the villagers found themselves without jobs to go to.Many of the people in this area will have to travel outside the district to find employment. There is plenty of work in this area if you happen to be a farmer.There are approximately twelve farms and also various small holdings.
